body.head: Grandparenting
body.p:
Though not particularly polyphiloprogenitive, I have three daughters, who have in due course presented me with a total of six grandchildren, to say nothing of a scattering of step children as well. This makes for a calendar well filled with birthday parties and other occasions on which grandparenting duties (usually baby sitting) must be undertaken. In 2022, for example, I note the following: January 21-24
We went to Maryland to look after Coco, Daphne, and Al so that Elizabeth could join her sisters for a spa weekend. Full instructions were provided and a splendid time was had by all. Feb 12th
To Stourton for a joint celebration of Lila's and Paddy's 12th birthdays: there was cake and chocolate March 11-16
To Maryland once more: Daphne made a pizza, learned how to make bol renverse, and lost a tooth; Coco just looked cute. April 14-15
Lila etc visit 23-24 April
To Stourton village hall for Leon's 2nd birthday party: there were lots of nibbles and balloons and everyone got quite tired; July 10th
Belinda and Sarah came and took us out for Lilette's birthday (aka Panos's birthday barbie) 21-22 Oct
Stay at Ibis Stratford
3-6 November
I am always seem to be away for Belinda's birthday, so this year I suggested she move it back a week. And so we spent a few days in Arnold and Sherwood, doing exciting things like accompany her to the opticians and having lunch of course. There were also sparklers, which Harvey appreciated.
